p: All samples were obtained from the Research Laboratory of Clinical Virology, Institute of Infectious and Respiratory Diseases, Ruijin Hospital. Nasopharyngeal specimens from the 2016–2017 winter and 2017 summer influenza outbreaks were collected from influenza-infected inpatients before the administration of antiviral treatment. The samples were classified into the following two groups in chronological order: 2016win (Nov. 2016 to Mar. 2017) and 2017sum (May 2017 to Sep. 2017). Nasopharyngeal swabs were placed into 2 ml cryovials containing virus transport medium and stored at −80 °C until isolation and analysis.
